page.title: 16TANGLEY HOUSE-NR.HATHERDEN
page.content: Mr.Mrs. Colvin own 600 acres in Tangley and live in Tangley House which they bought from Mrs.Smith-Pearce in 1960.They have five helpers on their Upper Green Farm which supplies three other farms with water from three 400 feet deep wells.Mr.Colvin has been a Member of Parliament since 1979 and now represents Romsey and Waterside and is also Paliamentary Private Secretary in the Foreign Office.From Monday to Thursday evening they live in London near the Houses of Parliament and spend most weekends either in Romsey or relaxing at home in Tangley.By train it takes them one and a quarter hours to commute from Andover to London and 25 years ago they were almost the only commuters. This is a major change that they have noticed.
